FuncDef: This command defines how packets matching the forwarding class will be mapped to an HSMDA queue ID. The SAP QoS policies simultaneously support both standard service queue mappings and HSMDA queue mappings for the same forwarding class; the HSMDA node is used to separate the HSMDA mappings from the standard mappings This allows the same QoS policy to be used on a standard MDA-attached SAP and an HSMDA-attached SAP.
